quotes.message: The most common way people give up their power is by thinking they don't have any.
quotes.name: Alice Walker

quotes.message: Your own words are the bricks and mortar of the dreams you want to realize. Your words are the greatest power you have. The words you choose and their use establish the life you experience.
quotes.name: Sonia Croquette

quotes.message: We never know how high we are Till we are called to rise; And then, if we are true to plan, Our statures touch the skies.
quotes.name: Emily Dickinson

quotes.message: If we don't change, we don't grow. If we don't grow, we are not really living. Growth demands a temporary surrender of security.
quotes.name: Gail Sheehy

quotes.message: Reach high, for stars lie hidden in your soul. Dream deep, for every dream precedes the goal.
quotes.name: Pamela Vaull Starr

quotes.message: You have been criticizing yourself for years, and it hasn't worked. Try approving of yourself and see what happens.
quotes.name: Louise L. Hay

quotes.message: Do not follow where the path may lead. Go instead where there is no path and leave a trail.
quotes.name: Muriel Strode

quotes.message: If you're able to be yourself, then you have no competition. All you have to do is get closer and closer to that essence.
quotes.name: Barbara Cook

quotes.message: Nurture your mind with great thoughts, for you will never go any higher than you think.
quotes.name: Benjamin Disraeli

quotes.message: The question isn't who's going to let me; it's who's going to stop me.
quotes.name: Ayn Rand

quotes.message: It took me quite a long time to develop a voice, and now that I have it, I am not going to be silent.
quotes.name: Madeleine Albright

quotes.message: Instead of looking at the past, I put myself ahead twenty years and try to look at what I need to do now in order to get there then
quotes.name: Diana Ross

quotes.message: I could not, at any age, be content to take my place by the fireside and simply look on. Life was meant to be lived. Curiosity must be kept alive. One must never, for whatever reason, turn his back on life.
quotes.name: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.message: Never dull your shine for somebody else.
quotes.name: Tyra Banks

quotes.message: Life is not easy for any of us. But what of that? We must have perseverance and above all confidence in ourselves. We must believe that we are gifted for something and that this thing must be attained.
quotes.name: Marie Curie

quotes.message: Always be a first-rate version of yourself, instead of a second-rate version of somebody else.
quotes.name: Judy Garland

quotes.message: Don't ask yourself what the world needs, ask yourself what makes you come alive. And then go and do that. Because what the world needs is people who are alive.
quotes.name: Howard Thurman

quotes.message: He who is not everyday conquering some fear has not learned the secret of life.
quotes.name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.message: Nobody can go back and start a new beginning, but anyone can start today and make a new ending.
quotes.name: Maria Robinson

quotes.message: You cannot control what happens to you, but you can control your attitude toward what happens to you, and in that, you will be mastering change rather than allowing it to master you.
quotes.name: Sri Ram

quotes.message: Our greatness lies not so much in being able to remake the world as in being able to remake ourselves.
quotes.name: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.message: If you don't make mistakes, you're not working on hard enough problems. And that's a big mistake.
quotes.name: F. Wikzek

quotes.message: Success consists of going from failure to failure without loss of enthusiasm.
quotes.name: Winston Churchill

quotes.message: Always make your future bigger than your past.
quotes.name: Dan Sullivan

quotes.message: The great leaders are like the best conductors - they reach beyond the notes to reach the magic in the players.
quotes.name: Blaine Lee

quotes.message: Power can be taken, but not given. The process of the taking is empowerment in itself.
quotes.name: Gloria Steinem

quotes.message: Never tell people how to do things.
quotes.name: General George Smith Patton

quotes.message: One of the most courageous things you can do is identify yourself, know who you are, what you believe in and where you want to go.
quotes.name: Sheila Murray Bethel

quotes.message: Courage is like a muscle.
quotes.name: Ruth Gordo

quotes.message: No one can make you feel inferior without your consent.
quotes.name: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.message: How wrong is it for a woman to expect the man to build the world she wants, rather than to create it herself?
quotes.name: Anais Nin

quotes.message: A lot of people are afraid to say what they want. That's why they don't get what they want.
quotes.name: Madonna

quotes.message: You may encounter many defeats, but you must not be defeated. In fact, it may be necessary to encounter the defeats, so you can know who you are, what you can rise from, how you can still come out of it.
quotes.name: Maya Angelou

quotes.message: You cannot get through a single day without having an impact on the world around you. What you do makes a difference, and you have to decide what kind of difference you want to make.
quotes.name: Jane Goodall

quotes.message: Our deepest fear is not that we are inadequate. Our deepest fear is that we are powerful beyond measure. It is our light, not our darkness that frightens us. We ask ourselves, who am I to be brilliant, gorgeous, talented, fabulous? Actually, who are you not to be.
quotes.name: Marianne Williamson

quotes.message: It takes a great deal of courage to stand up to your enemies, but even more to stand up to your friends.
quotes.name: J.K. Rowling

quotes.message: Life shrinks or expands in proportion to one's courage.
quotes.name: Anais Nin

quotes.message: You are Beautiful ~ You are a beautiful soul. The light that emanates from you has the power to heal and transform others. Your unique and magnificent expression is unlike any others' on the entire planet. Your beauty makes the world a better place the beauty that radiates from your heart is a gift to others.
quotes.name: Christine Kloser

quotes.message: An authentically empowered person is humble. This does not mean the false humility of one who stoops to be with those who are below him or her. It is the inclusiveness of one who responds to the beauty of each soul. It is the harmlessness of one who treasures, honors, and reveres life in all its forms.
quotes.name: Gary Zukav

quotes.message: My goal is not to be better than anyone else..but to be better that I used to be.
quotes.name: Dr. Wayne W. Dyer

quotes.message: What we think determines what happens to us, so if we want to change our lives, we need to stretch our minds.
quotes.name: Dr.Wayne Dyer

quotes.message: One little known secret to making precisely the right move, at precisely the right time in your life is knowing that in all cases, there is more than one right move and more than one right time. Lots and lots more.
quotes.name: Mike Dooley

quotes.message: Authentic empowerment is the knowing that you are on purpose, doing God's work, peacefully and harmoniously.
quotes.name: Wayne Dyer

quotes.message: Whatever you are, be a good one.
quotes.name: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.message: There's a basic philosophy here that by empowering...workers you'll make their jobs far more interesting, and they'll be able to work at a higher level than they would have without all that information just a few clicks away.
quotes.name: Bill Gates

quotes.message: You may never know what results come of your action, but if you do nothing there will be no result
quotes.name: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.message: Give light, and the darkness will disappear of itself.
quotes.name: Desiderius Erasmus

quotes.message: An idea is never given to you without you being given the power to make it reality. You must, nevertheless, suffer for it.
quotes.name: Richard Bach

quotes.message: AUTONOMOUS NURTURING. Not waiting for someone to give you what you can give yourself.
quotes.name: Rob Brezsny
